thread.title: Could Russia have lost control of a chemical weapon?

title: Could Russia have lost control of a chemical weapon?
text:
Could Russia have lost control of a chemical weapon? 12:21am IST - 02:00 
Britain believes the nerve agent used in the Sergei Skripal incident was of Russian origin. But the disarray that followed the fall of the Soviet Union could have let the weapon fall into the hands of a another, unknown, party.   
Britain believes the nerve agent used in the Sergei Skripal incident was of Russian origin. But the disarray that followed the fall of the Soviet Union could have let the weapon fall into the hands of a another, unknown, party.  //reut.rs/2IoGJDM
